code: import React from"react";import MyImage from"../../assets/images/my-family3.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function About(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"row g-0 text-center",id:"aboutSection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6 d-flex flex-column align-items-center justify-content-center text-center p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"display-4",children:"About Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-san-serif",children:"Hello, everyone! My name is Matthew Baty, I am 28 years old, and I live in Charlotte, NC. I have been here for almost 6 years with my wife, Riley. I joined the Marine Corps right after high school and I served honorably for four years. Following the Marine Corps, I moved to the Charlotte area to be with my then fiancee. We got married shortly after and will be celebrating our 6th anniversary this year. I attended Winthrop University shortly after moving here and receieved my BS in Corporate Finance. I worked full time in retail management while going to school. I then transitioned into my current job, Speed Digital. I have had a few different roles while working there, but I just recently transitioned to an Associate Full Stack Developer thanks to the UNC Charlotte Coding Bootcamp. I am excited to see where this new career path takes me!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:MyImage,className:"img-fluid mt-3 p-2",alt:"Matthew Baty and his family"})})]});}
